kineticstoolkit.dbinterface¶

Provide the DBInterface class.

Classes

DBInterface(project_label[, user, password, …])

Interface for Felix Chenier’s BIOMEC database.
class kineticstoolkit.dbinterface.DBInterface(project_label, user='', password='', root_folder='', url='https://felixchenier.uqam.ca/biomec')¶

Interface for Felix Chenier’s BIOMEC database.

Parameters
project_label

Project label, for example ‘FC_XX16E’.

user

Optional. Username on BIOMEC. If none is supplied, a dialog box asks the user for his/her credentials.

password

Optional. Password on BIOMEC.

root_folder

Optional. Project’s root folder, where all data files are stored. If none is given, a dialog box asks the user to point to this folder.

url

Optional. BIOMEC’s url.

Attributes
files

Return a list of all file labels in the project.

participants

Return a list of all participant labels in the project.

sessions

Return a list of all session labels in the project.

trials

Return a list of all trial labels in the project.

Methods

refresh()

Update from database and reindex files.

Rename a file to include or modify a dbfid code in its filename.

Save a variable to a BIOMEC referenced file.

Rename all files to include tags in file names.
batch_fix_file_type(folder, new_file_type_label, create_file_entries=False, dry_run=True)¶

Batch-rename files in a folder to their new corresponding dbfid.

Parameters
folder

Folder that contains the set of files to rename. These files must have the original dbfid in their name, to identify the trial they belong to.

new_file_type_label

FileTypeLabel as set in the database. For example: ‘LabelledKinematics’.

create_file_entries

Optional. When True and if a file entry for the specified file type ID does not exist in the found trial, create the file entry in the database, then rename the file accordingly.

dry_run

Optional. When True, the list of file renames is returned, but no action is actually taken.

Returns
Dict[str, List[Any]]

A dictionary with the following keys:

  • ‘Rename’ : list of tuples (old_file_name, new_file_name).

  • ‘Ignore’ : list of files without a dbfid.

  • ‘NoFileTypeLabel’ : list of files which associated trial does not contain the specified FileTypeLabel

Return type

Dict[str, List[Any]]

create_file_entry(trial_id, file_type_label)¶

Create a file entry in the database.

Parameters
trial_id

Trial identifier in the database. Can be obtained using get(participant, session, trial)[‘TrialID’].

file_type_label

File type label.

Return type

None

property files: List[str]¶

Return a list of all file labels in the project.

Return type

List[str]

get(participant='', session='', trial='', file='')¶

Extract information from a project.

Parameters
participant

Optional. Participant label (for example, ‘P01’).

session :

Optional. Session label (for example, ‘SB4320’).

trial :

Optional. Trial label (for example, ‘Static’).

file :

Optional. File label (for example, ‘Kinematics’).

Returns
Dict[str, Any]

A record of the specified information.

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

load(participant, session, trial, file)¶

Load a variable from a BIOMEC referenced file.

Parameters
participant

Participant label. For example, ‘P01’

session

Session label. For example, ‘SB4320’

trial

Trial label. For example, ‘StaticR1’

file

File type label. For example, ‘SyncedMarkers’

Returns
Any

The file’s content.

Return type

Any

Return a list of all participant labels in the project.

Update from database and reindex files.

Return type

None

rename(filename, dbfid)¶

Rename a file to include or modify a dbfid code in its filename.

Parameters
filename

Name of the file to rename

dbfid

FileID in database

Return type

None

save(participant, session, trial, file, variable)¶

Save a variable to a BIOMEC referenced file.

Parameters
participant

Participant label. For example, ‘P01’

session

Session label. For example, ‘SB4320’

trial

Trial label. For example, ‘StaticR1’

file

File type label. For example, ‘SyncedMarkers’

variable

Any variable that is supported by ktk.save

Returns
str

The file path

Return type

str

property sessions: List[str]¶

Return a list of all session labels in the project.

Return type

List[str]

tag_files(include_trial_name=True, dry_run=True)¶

Rename all files to include tags in file names.

Parameters
include_trial_name

Optional. True to include the trial name from the file name.

dry_run

Optional. Set to False to actually perform the rename.

Return type

None

property trials: List[str]¶

Return a list of all trial labels in the project.

Return type

List[str]
